contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yeşilyurt | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | latd = 38 |latm = 17 |lats = 46 |latNS = N | longd = 38 |longm = 14 |longs = 56 |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_format = dms | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Turkey]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Turkey|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Malatya Province|Malatya]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = [[Justice and Development Party (Turkey)|AKP]] | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Mehmet Kavuk | leader_title1 = [[Kaymakam]] | leader_name1 = Erkan Bulgan | elevation_m = | area_footnotes = {{Turkey district areas|SOURCE}} | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = {{Turkey district areas|Malatya|Yeşilyurt}} | population_footnotes = {{Turkey district populations|SOURCE|Malatya}} | population_urban = {{Turkey district populations|Malatya|Yeşilyurt|şehir}} | population_as_of = {{Turkey district populations|YEAR}} | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = {{Turkey district populations|Malatya|Yeşilyurt|toplam}} | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | website = {{URL| www.malatyayesilyurt.bel.tr | www.malatyayesilyurt.bel.tr }} }} '''Yeşilyurt''' is a town and district of [[Malatya Province]] in the [[Eastern Anatolia Region, Turkey|Eastern Anatolia]] region of [[Turkey]]. The mayor is Mehmet Kavuk ([[Justice and Development Party (Turkey)|AKP]]). ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.malatyayesilyurt.gov.tr/ District governor's official website] {{tr icon}} {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Malatya|}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yesilyurt, Malatya}} [[Category:Populated places in Malatya Province]] [[Category:Districts of Malatya Province]] {{EAnatolia-geo-stub}}
